title: Croft: Appeal after man seriously injured in road crash
title_page: Croft: Appeal after man seriously injured in road crash - BBC News
maintext:
A man has suffered serious injuries in a crash in Leicestershire.
It happened at about 21:45 GMT on Monday in Croft Hill Road, Croft, near to the junction of Thurlaston Lane and Huncote Road, police said.
It involved one vehicle, a white Vauxhall Corsa, and left the occupant requiring hospital treatment.
Leicestershire Police has appealed for anyone with information or relevant dashcam footage to contact the force.
